page.title: 05MOLESWORTH, Cambridgeshire
page.content:
It was felt necessary to refer to this former airfield, now a proposed Cruise Missile base, which lies immediately to the North/West of the survey area.
Residents of Catworth, being South of the A604, do not find much disruption but at times of demonstrations by anti nuclear protestors, problems are found with parking of cars at Leighton and the sheer number of people in Brington
In February 1985 a fence was erected round the proposed base. Ignoring the opinions for or against the principle, it was felt locally to be well-planned
Time will tell whether the children at the area school will be affected by the changes and whether living in the villages will be different. Meanwhile life goes on much as before.
